CustomField.formula: IF(YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(SCC_TanggalLahir__c) >= 2011, "Generasi Alpha", IF(YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(SCC_TanggalLahir__c) >= 1997, "Generasi Z", IF(YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(SCC_TanggalLahir__c) >= 1981, "Generasi Milenial", IF(YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(SCC_TanggalLahir__c) >= 1965, "Generasi X", IF(YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(SCC_TanggalLahir__c) >= 1946, "Baby Boomer", IF(YEAR(TODAY()) - VALUE(SCC_TanggalLahir__c) < 1946, "Silent Generatioin", "N/A"))))))
CustomField.label: Kategori Usia
